item.description:
**Important: MUST ARRIVE by 7:20 pm latest**
(There's NO buzzer. Door will be left opened til 7:20 pm. After that, door will be locked for security. Jon's loft is on the 3rd floor; not practical to have someone keep going down to the first floor to unlock the door for entrance.)


Many of you ask for a meetup where folks can just socialize & learn more of each other ...what we want to attract, how we can support each other, mastermind etc.

Thanks to Jon Fischer, who manifested his own "loft" after "experiencing" Dave's loft ;0), he is opening his loft for us to get together. We'll have some fun "meet & connect with a LoA twist" activities, exchange experiences, create new networks & deepen friendships with heart-centered folks.  

***************************************************************

RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming. 
We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your understanding & support!

**************************************************************

Click here for Directions & Parking

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Meet & Connect with a LoA Twist
